attributes.action: The Northern Rail Cup Rugby League should not be scrapped in 2014
attributes.additional_details:
The RFL have decided to scrap the Northern Rail Cup in 2014. What right have they got to do this? This is a brilliant competition for the lower league  teams and brings extra revenue for the clubs. I want this petition to show the RFL how much interest there is and what a bad decision it is to scrap this cup next year!

Please sign this petition to prevent the RFL scrapping this cup in 2014
